description: Hard and soft landscaping works, including provision of raised planters and cycle parking facilities to front and sides of existing Church.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All landscaping shall be carried out strictly in accordance with the hereby approved details and shall be completed during the first planting season after the completion of the hard surfacing hereby approved or the removal of the lime trees on the Evershot Road boundary, whichever is the sooner. This landscaping and the trees planted must have a two year maintenance/ watering provision commencing at completion of the planting of the final plant. Trees or shrubs which die within five years of completion of planting of the final plant shall be replaced to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority with the same species or an approved alternative. 

REASON: To ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained in accordance with policy Env6 of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002.
